description: This colourful veggie packed pad Thai is a fun way and tasty way to use your spiraliser.
name: Prawn & Zucchini Pad Thai Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 spring onions, finely sliced, green tops reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan or wok on medium high heat and cook the garlic, ginger and spring onions for 4 minutes. Tip in the spiralised zucchinis and carrots and cook for 3 minutes.

Add the beansprouts and prawns and cook for 2 minutes then stir in the fish sauce, half of the coriander and the lime juice. Serve with the remaining chopped coriander, spring onion tops and chopped peanuts on top.
